description: A collection of circles in a triangular formation with rounded corners that is bisected by a horizontal hourglass-shaped formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a pale grayish-blue triangle in the center of the hourglass-shaped formation where it overlaps the triangular formation and a paler grayish-blue triangle on the right side of the hourglass-shaped formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
